long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Doodle Jump, the popular vertical platforming game, is now available as a Chrome Extension in a convenient pop-up format that doesn't require an internet connection. Experience the addictive gameplay of Doodle Jump right from your Chrome browser, anytime and anywhere.

With the Doodle Jump Chrome Extension, you can enjoy the thrilling jumping action and challenging obstacles without the need for an internet connection. Engage in endless hopping adventures as you guide your character higher and higher, aiming to achieve the highest score possible.

Whether you're a fan of casual games or enjoy quick gaming sessions, the Chrome Extension version of Doodle Jump offers a seamless and offline gaming experience. Get ready to bounce your way to the top in this captivating game, now available in a pop-up format on your Chrome browser.
